member.name: P:dnSpy.Debugger.DotNet.Metadata.Impl.DmdTypeBase.IsFullyResolved
member.summary:
true if there are no metadata references. This instance and any other that it references directly or indirectly (element type, generic arguments) are all resolved types (TypeDefs, and not TypeRefs).
Even if this property is true, it could still have metadata references: optional/required modifiers, base type, types in custom attributes, etc could contain one or more TypeRefs.
